name: Leech Seed
effect: If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, Deal 1 damage to the foe, and heal the User for 1 HP for every damage dealt this way. Grass Type Pokemon are immune to this Move. -1 Accuracy.
description: The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.
